postBootScript: yum install -y wget;wget  http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/mobius_start_up_v1.1.sh -O /root/mobius_start_up.sh; sh /root/mobius_start_up.sh WORKFLOW;echo 'SUBNET via IPADDR' >> /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/route-eth1;/etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifup-routes eth1;git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/Mobius-scripts.git /root/Mobius-scripts; cp /root/Mobius-scripts/scripts/worker_nonfs.sh /root/worker_nonfs.sh;sed -i 's/NETWORK_INTERFACE=/NETWORK_INTERFACE=REPLACEIP/g' /root/worker_nonfs.sh;sh /root/worker_nonfs.sh
